headline: Newmont (NEM) Is Up 8.7% After Q3 Earnings Beat on Record Gold Prices – What's Changed
summary: Newmont Corporation recently reported fiscal Q3 2025 results that surpassed Wall Street expectations for both revenue and earnings per share, largely driven by record-high gold prices despite a 4% decrease in gold production due to lower grades and planned shutdowns. Management emphasized that the unprecedented surge in gold prices more than offset operational challenges, highlighting gold price sensitivity as a core component of Newmont's financial performance. With the company’s earnings...
